abstract: Defense lawyer for John F Haggerty Jr, consultant accused of stealing $1.1 from Mayor Bloomberg's 2009 re-election campaign, attempts to discredit Bloomberg in his closing argument.
snippet: In his closing argument, John F. Haggerty Jr.’s lawyer tried to link Michael R. Bloomberg’s ambition to the charges against his client.
lead_paragraph: In his closing argument, John F. Haggerty Jr.’s lawyer tried to link Michael R. Bloomberg’s ambition to the charges against his client.

headline.main: Two Competing Theories in Bloomberg Consultant’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Two Competing Theories in Bloomberg Consultant’s Trial
headline.seo: Closing Arguments in Theft Trial of John Haggerty
